experience.title: Quantitative Analytics Specialist
experience.description: At EADS India, I play a pivotal role in steering the design, development, validation, implementation, and documentation of cutting-edge quantitative models. These models serve as the cornerstone for delivering actionable insights spanning product enhancements, strategic business maneuvers, and risk management endeavors. My responsibilities entail leveraging advanced mathematical methodologies and programming prowess to craft and authenticate analytic models, ensuring their resilience and efficacy in meeting organizational objectives. This role allows me to continuously drive innovation and contribute significantly to the strategic vision of the company.
experience.description_html: At EADS India, I play a pivotal role in steering the design, development, validation, implementation, and documentation of cutting-edge quantitative models. These models serve as the cornerstone for delivering actionable insights spanning product enhancements, strategic business maneuvers, and risk management endeavors. My responsibilities entail leveraging advanced mathematical methodologies and programming prowess to craft and authenticate analytic models, ensuring their resilience and efficacy in meeting organizational objectives. This role allows me to continuously drive innovation and contribute significantly to the strategic vision of the company.

experience.title: Imagineer
experience.description: Project : Innovation Ecosystem - Developing an interactive web application, serving as one stop shop for all innovations in the category Work areas: Product Management, UI, UX, Python, Data validation, Data harmonization, Oral Care category• Conducted extensive discovery sessions with clients to understand the business requirements and shortcomings in the current process• Coordinated with a team of 2 UI Designers to develop the UI -UX journey using Figma and built the logics for the application • Developed python script for data harmonisation and validation reducing the overall process time by ~5 hoursProject : Data Pull Automation - Automated data extraction from e commerce websites for monthly reportsWork areas: Python, Selenium, Beautiful Soup, Analytics, Power BI, E commerce, Baby Care category• Automated data extraction from e commerce websites (Amazon, Walmart etc) for monthly reports using Selenium & Beautiful Soup• Built Power BI dashboards showcasing important trends in sentiment thereby enabling data driven decision makingProject : Trend Analysis Automation - Biweekly Power BI reports tracking Covid trends and Category SalesWork areas: PowerBI, Power Automate, Python, Consulting, Nielsen Data, IQVIA Data, C&C category• Built PowerBI reports using Nielsen/IQVIA data and Google Trends data for 5 countries to compare the monthly sales and covid trend• Automated the complete process using Power Automate to send out biweekly reports to 100+ clients, significantly reducing the overall time by ~90% Others Works• Built a product recommender system using e commerce data incorporating various techniques like LightFM, Apriori algorithm • Prepared a newsletter using MailChimp on “Collaborative Filtering” and shared it across with 1800+ Fractalites for learning purposes• Automated the process of PPT creation and mailing using VBA to send training certificates to 500+ Fractalites
experience.description_html: Project : Innovation Ecosystem - Developing an interactive web application, serving as one stop shop for all innovations in the category Work areas: Product Management, UI, UX, Python, Data validation, Data harmonization, Oral Care category• Conducted extensive discovery sessions with clients to understand the business requirements and shortcomings in the current process• Coordinated with a team of 2 UI Designers to develop the UI -UX journey using Figma and built the logics for the application • Developed python script for data harmonisation and validation reducing the overall process time by ~5 hoursProject : Data Pull Automation - Automated data extraction from e commerce websites for monthly reportsWork areas: Python, Selenium, Beautiful Soup, Analytics, Power BI, E commerce, Baby Care category• Automated data extraction from e commerce websites (Amazon, Walmart etc) for monthly reports using Selenium & Beautiful Soup• Built Power BI dashboards showcasing important trends in sentiment thereby enabling data driven decision makingProject : Trend Analysis Automation - Biweekly Power BI reports tracking Covid trends and Category SalesWork areas: PowerBI, Power Automate, Python, Consulting, Nielsen Data, IQVIA Data, C&C category• Built PowerBI reports using Nielsen/IQVIA data and Google Trends data for 5 countries to compare the monthly sales and covid trend• Automated the complete process using Power Automate to send out biweekly reports to 100+ clients, significantly reducing the overall time by ~90% Others Works• Built a product recommender system using e commerce data incorporating various techniques like LightFM, Apriori algorithm • Prepared a newsletter using MailChimp on “Collaborative Filtering” and shared it across with 1800+ Fractalites for learning purposes• Automated the process of PPT creation and mailing using VBA to send training certificates to 500+ Fractalites

experience.title: Data Science Intern
experience.description: Granted a pre-placement offer as a Data Scientist for constantly exceeding expectations in deliverablesProject : Biomedical Image Segmentation• Developed an efficient deep learning model using computer vision to demarcate boundary of WBC in blood's microscopic images• Implemented U-net architecture of CNN along with dynamic learning rate technique to achieve a state of art dice score of 91.7%• Incorporated the algorithm on TCG's analytics platform, MCube and involved in giving end to end demo to the clientProject : Wage Optimization and Attrition Prediction• Given US client's hourly wage data, formulated strategy to predict optimal wage, thereby reducing the chance of employee attrition• Employed random forest algorithm, along with feature engineering to achieve 94.1% accuracy on the attrition model
experience.description_html: Granted a pre-placement offer as a Data Scientist for constantly exceeding expectations in deliverablesProject : Biomedical Image Segmentation• Developed an efficient deep learning model using computer vision to demarcate boundary of WBC in blood's microscopic images• Implemented U-net architecture of CNN along with dynamic learning rate technique to achieve a state of art dice score of 91.7%• Incorporated the algorithm on TCG's analytics platform, MCube and involved in giving end to end demo to the clientProject : Wage Optimization and Attrition Prediction• Given US client's hourly wage data, formulated strategy to predict optimal wage, thereby reducing the chance of employee attrition• Employed random forest algorithm, along with feature engineering to achieve 94.1% accuracy on the attrition model

experience.title: Deep Learning Intern
experience.description: • Built an algorithm to classify social media  text posts using NLP techniques such as Word Embedding using GloVe, NLTK, Textblob etc• Assembled an algorithm to split non camelcase hash tags, posted on social media, using Maximum Known Matching Scoring Method• Assembled Hashtag Splitting algorithm with text classification, used for Sentimental Analysis for a product launched by company• Tagged images posted on Social Media using YOLO v2 trained on 80 class MS COCO dataset for content cross promotion• Associated with team involved in building an Insurance Chatbot product, using semantic similarity calculated via TF*IDF vectorization• Ensembled algorithms and launched the chatbot on Telegram app by the name WNS DS Bot
experience.description_html: • Built an algorithm to classify social media text posts using NLP techniques such as Word Embedding using GloVe, NLTK, Textblob etc• Assembled an algorithm to split non camelcase hash tags, posted on social media, using Maximum Known Matching Scoring Method• Assembled Hashtag Splitting algorithm with text classification, used for Sentimental Analysis for a product launched by company• Tagged images posted on Social Media using YOLO v2 trained on 80 class MS COCO dataset for content cross promotion• Associated with team involved in building an Insurance Chatbot product, using semantic similarity calculated via TF*IDF vectorization• Ensembled algorithms and launched the chatbot on Telegram app by the name WNS DS Bot

experience.title: Core Team Member
experience.description: • Worked with a team of 40 people to successfully organize Kshitij 2017,the annual techno-management symposium of the institute which saw overall participation of 60000, and a footfall of over 3000 participants from all over India.• Canvassed funds worth INR 4.8 lacs from Delhi, Mumbai and Kolkata for Kshitij 2017.  • Conducted the event TechKarnival for 1400 Campus Freshers.• Conducted pre-fest Workshops in Kolkata which saw overwhelming response.• Secured association of 14 venture capitalist and early stage investment firms with the Business plan competition of Kshitij 2017 and achieved highest number of associations till date.• Co-ordinated with the representatives of leading B-Schools of the country such as IIMs, XLRI and achieved the highest participation till date.• Solely Responsible for executing flagship event RoboWars during Kshitij 2017 which saw highest ever participation till date• Responsible for executing the Inaugration Ceremony of Kshitij 2017.• Took the initiative of undertaking the outdoor publicity of the fest through outdoor media and multiplexes in 10 cities through malls and multiplexes.
experience.description_html: • Worked with a team of 40 people to successfully organize Kshitij 2017,the annual techno-management symposium of the institute which saw overall participation of 60000, and a footfall of over 3000 participants from all over India.• Canvassed funds worth INR 4.8 lacs from Delhi, Mumbai and Kolkata for Kshitij 2017. • Conducted the event TechKarnival for 1400 Campus Freshers.• Conducted pre-fest Workshops in Kolkata which saw overwhelming response.• Secured association of 14 venture capitalist and early stage investment firms with the Business plan competition of Kshitij 2017 and achieved highest number of associations till date.• Co-ordinated with the representatives of leading B-Schools of the country such as IIMs, XLRI and achieved the highest participation till date.• Solely Responsible for executing flagship event RoboWars during Kshitij 2017 which saw highest ever participation till date• Responsible for executing the Inaugration Ceremony of Kshitij 2017.• Took the initiative of undertaking the outdoor publicity of the fest through outdoor media and multiplexes in 10 cities through malls and multiplexes.

experience.title: Campus Affiliate
experience.description: • Worked with a team for 22 people for the publicity and groundlevel execution of events in Kshitij 2016.• Responsible for the in-house publicity of the online events of Kshitij 2016 among the 10,000 residents at the institute.• Publicised in colleges of West Bengal getting the highest ever participation from the respective regions.• Led the media campaign in Indore & responsible for 4 media articles in leading newspapers of the region.• Sub-coordinator of the inaugural edition of event RoboWars.

projects: [{"title":"B Tech Project | IIT Kharagpur","start_date":"Jul 2018","end_date":"Apr 2019","description":"Digital Healthcare Recommendation System | Guide: Prof. Debasis Samanta, CSE-IIT KGP • Extracted data from medical search engines using Beautiful soup and maintained the user profile database in MongoDB• Devised a ranking system to rank the search engines and the URLs to select the best results• Implemented Apriori algorithm to recognize the frequently occurring patterns of symptoms, so as to optimize Question generation.• Assembled bidirectional LSTM encoder-decoder architecture with an attention mechanism to generate questions to be asked to users"},{"title":"Data Analysis Project | IIM Lucknow","start_date":"May 2016","end_date":"Jun 2016","description":"• Worked on 2 Harvard Business School cases, Employee Retention and Wages for gathering insights and suggesting data-driven decisions • Developed pricing strategies for the airline and hospitality industry by incorporating regression techniques and graphical analysis• Applied statistical techniques like Chi-Square test, Fisher's exact test on data to establish causation from correlations• Predicted customer behavior by regression modeling techniques after considering residual variation in the dataset"}]
